amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for Renewals of Expiring Section 8 tenant-based annual contributions contracts under Public and Indian Housing Programs by $75 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Renewals of Expiring Section 8 tenant-based annual contributions contracts under Public and Indian Housing Programs by $75 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Green, Al amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
